name: Heli Austria Flight Academy
about: Heli Austria Flight Academy, established in 2018, is a premier helicopter training institution in Austria and a founding member of the Leading Helicopter Academies (LHA) network. With over 35 years of experience in helicopter operations through Heli Austria, Heli Tirol, and MARTIN Flugrettung, the academy offers a comprehensive range of courses including Private Pilot License (PPL(H)), Commercial Pilot License (CPL(H)), Flight Instructor (FI(H)), and Airline Transport Pilot License Theory (ATPL(H)). The academy also provides type ratings for various helicopter models and advanced operational courses such as mountain training, external load training, and NVG training.
